rules.description: Use Shift+Enter for newline, Command+Enter for sending in Discord
Use Shift+Enter for newline, Command+Enter for sending in ClaudeCodeDesktop
Use Shift+Enter for newline, Command+Enter for sending in ChatGPT
Disable single Command+H, enable Command+H+H for hide

manipulators.description: Command+H+H - Execute minimize on second H
Command+H+H - Set flag on first Command+H

rules.description: Disable single Command+M, enable Command+M+M for minimize

manipulators.description: Command+M+M - Execute minimize on second M
Command+M+M - Set flag on first Command+M

rules.description: Simple modifications
Copy to ⌘c
Paste to ⌘v
Quit application by holding command-q
Change right_command+hjkl to arrow keys without HHKB
コマンドキー（左右どちらでも）を単体で押したときに、英数・かなをトグルで切り替える。 (rev 2)
Cmd単体で英数・かな送信（左:英数/右:かな）
escキーを押したときに、英数キーも送信する(vim用)
Exchange semicolon and colon
Use Shift+Enter for newline, Command+Enter for sending in Discord
Use Shift+Enter for newline, Command+Enter for sending in ClaudeCodeDesktop
Use Shift+Enter for newline, Command+Enter for sending in ChatGPT
Disable single Command+H, enable Command+H+H for hide

manipulators.description: Command+H+H - Execute minimize on second H
Command+H+H - Set flag on first Command+H

rules.description: Disable single Command+M, enable Command+M+M for minimize

manipulators.description: Command+M+M - Execute minimize on second M
Command+M+M - Set flag on first Command+M
